sentence.Network_en: Another solution is to remove the ampersand with the StripHotKey function.
sentence.Network_cn: 另一个解决办法是用StripHotKey函数来移去&号.

sentence.Network_en: A single ampersand is displayed in the caption and no characters are underlined.
sentence.Network_cn: 这样,在标题中显示单个“&”符,并且没有带下划线的字符.

list.abs: notice that the first query parameter is always preceded with a question mark . consequent values are separated using ampersands .请注意，第一次查询参数始终是前面有一个问号。因此价值观是分开使用的符号。
the variables and values are listed as pairs separated by an equalssign . each variable-value pair is separated by an ampersand .变量和价值观被列为对失散了等号。每个变量值对分离的一个符号。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: alteration of and per se and ‘ & by itself is and ’, formerly chanted as an aid to learning the sign

means.word_mean: 1. a punctuation mark (&) used to represent conjunction (and)
